writer.name: 玛伦·路易丝·凯恩 Maren Louise Käehne
托芙·迪特莱弗森 Tove Ditlevsen

introduction: Adapted from the autobiographical novel of the same name by Danish poet and author Tove Ditlevsen.Ditlevsen will be played by four actors in four periods of her life, from the late 1930s to her death in 1976, with Dyrholm playing the author and poet in her final years.The miniseries starts on the final day of her life as she tidies up her financial affairs and delivers her last manuscript to her publisher. The events of this day, culminating in her suicide, frame the miniseries.
